Hi guys,

I have a simple SIvlerlight Application which is based on the MVVM Light Toolkit.
I coded the following:

- User selects a row in a data grid and hits the delete button with an attached DeleteCommand (ICommand)
- DeleteCommand deletes the selected data

After that, I want a storyboard to be executed which shows a status box which indicates the user wether the entry has been deleted or not.

How can I trigger the storyboard after the DeleteCommand has finished its execution?

Cheers!
Daniel
